					MemcachedCache
					
											Memcached cache
										
				

								

					APCCache
					
											APC cache, performs caching used shared memory.
										
				

								

					NullCache
					
											Null cache, performs only request level caching.

		static method GetCache (line 67)
	
 
	
	

Fetches a named cache.
